mapper.select: SELECT o.order_code, o.order_status, u.user_id, u.user_name, o.order_recipient, p.pay_price, p.pay_date, p.pay_status, p.pay_method FROM tbl_order o JOIN tbl_pay p ON o.order_code = p.order_code JOIN tbl_user u ON o.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT r.order_code, r.refund_price, r.refund_status, r.user_name, r.user_id, p.pay_method FROM tbl_refund r JOIN tbl_order o ON r.order_code = o.order_code JOIN tbl_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN tbl_pay p ON r.pay_method = p.pay_method
